fields.description: Approximate date of when the attack took place

fields.name: country
fields.description: Country where the attack took place

fields.description: MD5 hash of the related file

fields.name: target

fields.name: reference
fields.description: Report or article referencing the attack

description: Targeted attacks related to civil society
